name: Bolt.DIY
description: AI-powered full-stack web development platform that allows you to prompt, run, edit, and deploy web applications using multiple LLM providers including OpenAI, Anthropic, Ollama, and more.
short_desc: Open-source AI coding assistant with multi-LLM support
author: StackBlitz Labs

form_fields.label: OpenAI API Key
form_fields.hint: Optional: Your OpenAI API key for GPT models

form_fields.label: Anthropic API Key
form_fields.hint: Optional: Your Anthropic API key for Claude models

form_fields.label: Ollama Base URL
form_fields.hint: Optional: Base URL for your Ollama instance

form_fields.label: Gemini API Key
form_fields.hint: Optional: Your Google Gemini API key
